source_caption_data.pre_caption: The video primarily shows a wide shot of an indoor room, filmed from a third-person over-the-shoulder POV. In the foreground, a blurry person is positioned on the left side of the frame, with only part of their chest-up body visible. They are holding a dark-colored smartphone in their extended hand, which is in the foreground, slightly to the right of their body, using its flashlight to illuminate the area ahead. The light from the phone projects towards the center of the frame, lighting up a dark indoor hallway that occupies the middle ground and extends into the background. Directly ahead, at the end of the hallway in the background and center, a closed white door with a small vent near its top is visible. To the right of the character, in the middle ground and on the right side of the frame, an open door is seen. Further to the right, also in the middle ground, another door is partially open. A light-colored, wall-mounted rectangular panel is positioned in the middle ground on the right wall. Adjacent to this panel, in the middle ground and to its right, a white piece of furniture supports a woven basket. Green foliage is visible in the middle ground, top right, above the panel. In the top right corner, also in the middle ground, a screen reflects the light from the smartphone. The camera is positioned at the subject's level.
